pr_title: fix #2260 Avoid onSubscribe race in FluxTimeout

timeline.bodyText:
could use a StepVerifier here to validate we go to the fallback all the time ?
also the reporter indicated that a low-millis timeout would sometimes trigger the issue too. maybe we can either add a test with ofMillis(1) or set a non-zero timeout for a percentage of the loops (eg. 10%) ?
timeline.author: simonbasle

timeline.message: behaviour change: always subscribe on source first

timeline.bodyText: let's order things logically, put firstTimeout before itemTimeout (and same in fields order above)
